A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Created a login just to review this movie. It honestly deserves 4 stars but it definitel does not deserve all the hate it's getting right now so I'm hoping to even the score. As a new trilogy\, I think it does an excellent job developing the new characters for ep IX while respecting the old trilogy and daring to try something new. Canto Blight got a little off track\, and one character's space ride is a far fetched\, but the final act (really the whole last hour) was everything a Star Wars film is meant to be.
